title: Kizuna Ichigeki
synopsis: Shortly after winning the World Martial Arts Tournament and using the winnings to pay off her grandfather's one hundred million yen debt, a reporter shows up on Kizuna Todoroki's doorstep. Impressed that such a young girl was able to defeat the 10-year reigning champion, the reporter wants to interview Kizuna for a piece on her and the Wadachi Ju-ken school of martial arts founded by Kizuna's grandfather.
staff: [['Hongou, Mitsuru', ['Director']], ['Norifumi, Kugai', ['Key Animation']], ['Kurahashi, Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Nakamura, Takashi', ['Art Director']]]
